job_details.Functieomschrijving:
We are looking for a Research Engineer to join the Algorithmic ML Optimization team that is developing new efficient ML architectures. In this role you will interact with the scientific community creating algorithms to accelerate the training and inference of ML models for Conversational AI.

   What you'll be doing:
     * Create new efficient ML architectures for Conversational AI (LLM, NLP, ASR, TTS, Multimodal/Vision)
     * Develop model optimization algorithms based on Neural Architecture Search, Pruning, Knowledge Distillation, etc.
     * Work in a dynamic, applied team of engineers and researchers
     * Work on large-scale multi-node ML models
       What we need to see
job_details.full_text:
Research Engineer

We are looking for a Research Engineer to join the Algorithmic ML Optimization team that is developing new efficient ML architectures. In this role you will interact with the scientific community creating algorithms to accelerate the training and inference of ML models for Conversational AI.

   What you'll be doing:
     * Create new efficient ML architectures for Conversational AI (LLM, NLP, ASR, TTS, Multimodal/Vision)
     * Develop model optimization algorithms based on Neural Architecture Search, Pruning, Knowledge Distillation, etc.
     * Work in a dynamic, applied team of engineers and researchers
     * Work on large-scale multi-node ML models
       What we need to see

profile_classification.rationale: The role focuses on developing new ML architectures and optimization algorithms for ML models, aligning with the core responsibilities of an ML Engineer. While it involves Conversational AI, the emphasis is on the underlying ML model optimization rather than building user-facing applications with generative models.

job_tasks.phrase: Create new efficient ML architectures for Conversational AI (LLM, NLP, ASR, TTS, Multimodal/Vision)
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly relates to the creation and design of machine learning model architectures, which is a core component of the Modeling task.

job_tasks.phrase: Develop model optimization algorithms based on Neural Architecture Search, Pruning, Knowledge Distillation, etc.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the development of algorithms specifically for optimizing ML models, fitting the Modeling category.
While the primary focus is on research and architecture, the development of these architectures implies software implementation, fitting into Software Development.

job_tasks.phrase: accelerate the training and inference of ML models
job_tasks.justification: Optimizing training and inference speed is a key aspect of making ML models production-ready and efficient, which falls under Operations Engineering (MLOps).
Understanding the domain of Conversational AI is necessary to align the ML model development with business needs in that area.

soft_skills.phrase: Work in a dynamic, applied team of engineers and researchers
